text: ああ、日本でのデビュー戦だっていうのに、どうして私一人に任せてくれない / の?
translation: Ugh, even though this is my debut battle in Japan, why won't they let me handle it alone?
grammar: 〜だっていうのに - 'even though', emphasizes contrast between expectation and reality

text: 仕方ないよ、作戦なんだから / 言っとくけど、くれぐれも足手まといになるようなことはしないでね
translation: It can't be helped, it's the operation plan. / Let me tell you, don't you dare become a burden.
grammar: 〜なんだから - 'because it is', emphasizes reason; 言っとく - contraction of 言っておく (saying in advance)

text: なんであんなのがパイロットに選ばれたの?
translation: Why was someone like that chosen as a pilot?
grammar: あんなの - dismissive demonstrative pronoun 'someone/something like that'

text: 二人がかりなんて、ひきようでやだな。趣味じゃない。
translation: Two people ganging up... that's cowardly and I don't like it. It's not my style.
grammar: 〜がかり - 'involving (number) of people'; やだ - casual/feminine form of 嫌だ

text: 私たちは選ぶ余裕なんてないのよ。生き残るための手段はね。
translation: We don't have the luxury of choosing. Not when it comes to the means of survival.
grammar: 〜なんてない - 'there's no such thing as'; 〜ための - 'for the purpose of'

text: 来た!
translation: It's here!
grammar: Past tense た used for completed action with present relevance

text: 攻撃開始 / じゃあ、あたしから行くわ、 / 援護してね / え、援護? / レディーサントよ
translation: Begin attack. / Then I'll go first. / Cover me, okay? / Huh, cover? / Ladies first.
grammar: 〜から行く - 'I'll go (first)'; あたし - feminine first person pronoun

text: って、後から来たくせにしきんのやな
translation: Hey, even though you came later, you're taking command, huh?
grammar: 〜くせに - 'even though/despite' with critical nuance; やな - Kansai dialect for だな

text: 行ける / え!?
translation: I can do it! / What!?

vocabulary.meaning: can do it, can go (potential form)

grammar: 行ける - potential form of 行く, here meaning 'I can do it/make it work'

text: お見事…
translation: Magnificent...
grammar: お〜 - honorific prefix adding politeness or admiration

text: どう?サードチルドレ。 / 戦いは常に無駄なく美しくよ。
translation: How's that, Third Children? / Battle should always be efficient and beautiful.
grammar: 〜なく - negative adverbial form 'without'; よ - feminine/assertive sentence-final particle

text: なんてインチキン
translation: What a cheat...
grammar: なんて - 'what a...!' exclamatory; ン at end is dialect/casual form

text: 本日午前10時58分15秒 / 2体に分離した目標高の攻撃を受けた初号機は / 鶴ヶ湾沖合2キロの海上に水没
translation: Today at 10:58:15 AM. Unit-01, which received an attack from Target A that split into two bodies, has submerged in the ocean 2 km offshore from Tsuruga Bay.
grammar: 〜を受ける - 'to receive' (here: to receive an attack); 〜に水没 - 'submerged in'

text: 同20秒、2号機は目標オツの攻撃により活動停止
translation: At 20 seconds past, Unit-02 ceased operation due to an attack from Target B.
grammar: 〜により - 'due to, by means of' (formal causative); 同〜 - 'same (time period)'

text: この状況に対するE計画責任者のコメント / 無様ね
translation: Comment from the Project E director regarding this situation. / Pathetic.
grammar: 〜に対する - 'regarding, concerning'; ね - feminine assertive particle

text: もう、あんたのせいでせっかくのデビュー戦がめちゃめちゃになっちゃったじゃない / 何言ってんだよ、僧侶が間抜けなことをしただけじゃないか
translation: Geez, because of you my precious debut battle became a total mess! / What are you saying? You're the one who did something stupid.
grammar: 〜のせいで - 'because of, due to (blame)'; 〜ちゃった - contraction of てしまった (regrettable completion); 〜だけ - 'just, only'

text: 間抜け?どうしてグズなあんたがそんなこと言えるのよ、ずーずーしいわね / なんだよ、焦って倒そうとするから大変なことになるんだろ / 何よあれ、海の中 / でドライモンみたいに
translation: Stupid? How can a slowpoke like you say such a thing? You've got some nerve. / What? It's because you rushed to defeat it that things got terrible. / What about you, in the ocean, like a drowned rat.
grammar: 〜て言える - 'can say'; 〜から - 'because' (casual); 〜ようとする - 'try to do'

text: ああ、死ぬなんて、トロボバややくさに!
translation: Ugh, to think I almost died, you slowpoke idiot!
grammar: 〜なんて - 'such a thing as'; トロボバ - slurred/emotional speech combining insults

text: 国連第二方面軍に指揮権を譲渡 / まったく恥をかかせおって
translation: Command authority transferred to UN Second Regional Army. / Good grief, making us lose face like this.

vocabulary.meaning: to be embarrassed, to lose face

grammar: 〜おって - archaic/masculine causative-receptive ending expressing frustration

text: ドー05分、N2爆雷により目標を攻撃
translation: At plus 05 minutes, target attacked by N2 depth charges.
grammar: 〜により - 'by means of' (formal); ドー - military time notation 'plus'

text: また地図を書き直さなきゃならんな / 厚生物質の28%を焼却に成功 / 足 / 止めに過ぎん、再度進行は時間の問題だ
translation: We'll have to redraw the map again. / Successfully incinerated 28% of the biological matter. / It's merely a delaying action. Resuming advance is just a matter of time.
grammar: 〜なきゃならん - casual/masculine 'must do'; 〜に過ぎない - 'nothing more than, merely'

text: ま、立て直しの時間が稼げただけでも儲けものっすよ / いいか、君たち
translation: Well, just being able to buy time for recovery is a gain. / Listen up, you two.
grammar: 〜だけでも - 'even just'; っすよ - casual/masculine copula contraction of です

text: 君たちの仕事は何だかわかるか / エヴァの操縦 / 違う / 使徒に勝つことだ / こんな集大を晒すために我々ネルフは存在しているわけではない / そのためには君たちが協力し合って
translation: Do you understand what your job is? / Piloting Eva. / Wrong. / It's to defeat the Angels. / NERV doesn't exist to expose such disgrace. / For that, you two must cooperate.
grammar: 〜わけではない - 'it's not that...'; 〜し合う - 'to do mutually/together'

text: なんでこんな奴と / もういい
translation: Why with someone like this... / That's enough.
grammar: なんで - casual 'why'; もういい - 'that's enough, stop'

text: どうしてみんなすぐに怒るの / 大人は恥をかきたくないのさ
translation: Why does everyone get angry so quickly? / Adults don't want to be embarrassed.
grammar: 〜たくない - negative desire 'don't want to'; のさ - explanatory masculine ending

text: あのミサトさんは / 後片付け / 責任者は責任取るためにいるからな
translation: What about Misato? / Cleaning up the aftermath. / Those in charge exist to take responsibility, after all.
grammar: 〜ためにいる - 'exist for the purpose of'; からな - explanatory 'because, you know'

text: 関係各省からの抗議文と被害報告書 / で、これがUNからの請求書
translation: Letters of protest and damage reports from all related ministries. / And this is the invoice from the UN.
grammar: 〜からの - 'from (institution/place)'; で - transitional particle 'and, so'

text: 広報部からの苦情もあるわよ / ちゃんと目通しといてね
translation: There's also a complaint from the PR department. / Make sure you look through them properly.

vocabulary.meaning: to look through, to read over

grammar: 〜といて - contraction of ておいて 'do in advance/make sure to do'; ちゃんと - 'properly, correctly'

text: 読まなくても分かってるわよ / 喧嘩をするならここでやれって言うんでしょ / ごめん、サッツ / 言われなくったって / 使徒が片付けばここでやるわよ
translation: I know even without reading them. / They're saying if we're going to fight, do it here, right? / Sorry, Ritsuko. / Even without being told. / Once the Angel is dealt with, we'll do it here.

vocabulary.meaning: to be settled, to be finished

grammar: 〜なくても - 'even without'; 〜なら - conditional 'if'; 〜って言う - quotative 'they say'; 〜なくったって - emphatic 'even without'; 〜ば - conditional 'when/if'

text: 使徒は必ず私が倒すわ / 副司令官はカンカンよ / 今度恥かかせたらさせんね間違いなく
translation: I will definitely defeat the Angel. / The Vice-Commander is furious. / If you embarrass him again, you're fired for sure.
grammar: 〜たら - conditional 'if'; 間違いなく - 'without a doubt, certainly'
